Welcome to my site!

Greetings! My name is Alexander Egorov.

I am currently a second year CS student at the University of Waterloo.
I enjoy solving problems revolving around algorithms and data structures.
I also have loads of fun working on projects, a few of which are listed below, and others in the Projects section on this site, and am always eager to learn more and pick up new skills.
To the right you’ll see a preview of the lastest post I have writte on my Blog. These posts cover a wide variety of topics that I’m interested in.
